about_the_game:
20 custom voices will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode."
*The lines used byThese voices areThe same asThose used by other custom voices.

Cast
Custom Male Voices
Pure 4: Jun Inoue
Hot-blooded 4: Daiki Hamano
Optimist 4: KensukeTamura
Refined 4: Jun Inoue
Calm 4: Ryo Iwasaki
Hero 4: KoujiTakeda
Leader 4: KensukeTamura
Samurai 4: KoujiTakeda
Veteran 4: Keiichi Kuwabara
Silent 4: Keiichi Kuwabara

Custom Female Voices
Innocent 4: Aya Fujita
Young 4: Chieko Kagose
Graceful 4: Yoko Fujita
Active 4: Mari Hagai
Determined 4: YunaTaniguchi
Calm 4: Kasumi Hitosugi
Old-fashioned 4: Aya Fujita
Alluring 4: Haruka Ito
Brave 4: Haruka Ito
Overbearing 4: Sanae Nakata

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

name: DW8E: Edit Voice Pack 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over　※No 4K compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
